title: Larry Kane: "Ticket To Ride"
description: Michael spoke with longtime Philadelphia news anchor Larry Kane in 2007 on the re-release of his book "Ticket To Ride: Inside the Beatles' 1964 and 1965 Tours That Changed the World" the same week Kane interviewed Yoko Ono, widow of John Lennon. The book was originally published in 2003.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Larry Kane)
